home.title: Certified Service Provider for Remote Employment
home.heroSubTitle: Development of recruitment and training of national cadres, connecting remote workers via a remote work platform

improve.preTitle: Improve Performance Levels in Your Organization
improve.subTitle: This text is an example of placeholder text that can be replaced within the same space. It has been generated initially.

choose.subTitle: Danat Sharjah is a leading Saudi company that offers a wide range of services to enhance quality and improve the efficiency of organizations in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia through recruitment and training of national cadres.
choose.1sub: Through accredited institutes for remote training for 12 months
choose.2sub: Through specialized and accredited institutes by the Technical and Vocational Training Corporation
choose.3sub: Through a strategic partnership with the secondary industrial institute to provide workers with specialized and accredited courses and diplomas

services.title: Danat Services
services.list2: Danat Platform to track attendance, departures, and performance for remote workers
services.list3: Consulting Services and Human Resources Solutions
services.list4: Providing consultations regarding structuring and managing remote workers
services.list5: Connecting remote workers on the platform of the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development

pricing.title: Danat Subscriptions for Remote Work
pricing.subTitle: Choose the subscription that suits you from Danat's remote work platform subscriptions. Whether your company is small, medium, or large, you will find the suitable subscription to meet your business needs and budget.

BASIC.NAME: Basic Danat
BASIC.title: Subscription with limited features, suitable for small business needs

FEATURES.FEATURE3: Employee registration in the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development remote work portal
FEATURES.FEATURE6: Works on all operating systems and devices

SILVER.NAME: Silver Danat
SILVER.title: Subscription that meets the basic needs of small and medium businesses

FEATURES.FEATURE2: Full management of the recruitment process
FEATURES.FEATURE3: Selecting remote workers who meet the required criteria
FEATURES.FEATURE4: One-week self-training for employees and managers in the organization
FEATURES.FEATURE5: Complete management of the recruitment process, including selection of remote workers who meet recruitment criteria, conducting interviews, scheduling and managing personal interviews, managing resumes, evaluation, classification, and shortlisting for employment contracts
FEATURES.FEATURE6: Assistance in registering remote workers in the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development remote work portal (through authorizing Danat Sharjah to complete and follow up on all registration procedures)
FEATURES.FEATURE7: Providing organizational, technical, systems, and applications capabilities for the organization to communicate with remote workers for tasks that need measurable performance
FEATURES.FEATURE9: Managing all operations for maintenance, operations, protection of systems, programs, tools, and utilizing the outcomes of technology
FEATURES.FEATURE10: Automated integration with the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development's sector systems
FEATURES.FEATURE11: Continuous updates with no additional cost for the organization
FEATURES.FEATURE12: Completing and finalizing recruitment processes within a maximum of 10 working days

PLATINUM_REMOTE.NAME: Platinum Danat
PLATINUM_REMOTE.title: Subscription that meets the professional needs of large businesses and organizations requiring professional services

FEATURES.FEATURE3: Replacing remote workers once every 6 months without charges
FEATURES.FEATURE4: Continuous productivity monitoring with monthly performance reports
FEATURES.FEATURE5: Providing and implementing remote work plans for the organization by profession
FEATURES.FEATURE6: Assisting in classifying jobs that can be done remotely and providing job classification
FEATURES.FEATURE7: Supervising remote workers during the first 3 months with providing training and development programs
FEATURES.FEATURE8: Sending monthly reports to the project management system and remote employee performance monitoring
FEATURES.FEATURE9: Providing any reports needed for direct financial support from the Human Resources Development Fund
FEATURES.FEATURE11: Comprehensive solutions for managing remote work through a set of services for managing a remote work environment
FEATURES.FEATURE12: Visiting the service implementation team at the organizationâ€™s location once a month to complete the implementation process and enhance service benefits
FEATURES.FEATURE13: Providing a suitable alternative for remote workers during resignation with a recruitment process
